method.name: IsInitialized
method.comment: Tests whether the object has been initialized.

method.name: _v5
method.comment: Turns OFF the ActionBar at the top of screen in ICS Increases the screen size

method.name: _v6
method.comment: Turns ON the ActionBar at the top of screen in ICS Decreases the screen size

method.name: _v7
method.comment:
Requires ICS and SDK 14 or greater Example:
ICS.Initialize(Activity, Me)

method.name: _v0
method.comment: Turns OFF the Navigation Bar at bottom of ICS

method.name: _vv1
method.comment: Turns ON the Navigation Bar at bottom of ICS
